trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents an error that occurs when a dynamic bind in the C# runtime binder is processed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx X$ xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xx x xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
